articles.title: Irish mum issues warning to parents after son's tragic illness after cold sore
articles.description: Amanda Scanlon had her worst nightmare come to life when a cold sore leaves her healthy son with a brain injury
articles.content:
Irish mum Amanda Scanlon has issued a warning to Irish parents to refrain from ever kissing a baby after her son was left with a brain injury from a cold sore.
